attributes.title: Truly the worst app I ever downloaded
attributes.review: Iâ€™ve never had a worse experience with an app. Once I downloaded and opened it it immediately called me ugly and told me to lose 10 pounds. Completely uncalled for. Then, it reminded me that for-profit prisons are a thing in this country and that mass incarceration is basically just modern day slave labor. It then suggested that I tweet al* l*ves m*tter. It also encouraged white supremacists to feel validated, and flashed me a picture of the confederate flag, the symbol of a FAILED rebellion. Anyway. Pretty disgusted. 0/10 would not recommend. Apple should take this app down.

attributes.title: I felt caged
attributes.review: This app is honestly terrible. The layout, the fonts, and the big Cheeto man all triggered my adhd and left me feeling sick and claustrophobic. Although I have the iPhone 11 I felt as if this app wasnt big enough to hold the ego of the child it was made for. We should set it free (delete it) so others wonâ€™t suffer through the same health risks.
